attributes.action: put the running of schools back in the hands of the LEA
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We have found that school governors are not up to the job of running our schools.They do not have the expertise,intelligence or compassion to protect our children.Although the LEA is not ideal at least they are professionals ie paid to do a job and have somthing to lose.So we petition the prime minister to remove control of our schools from governors and put it back in the hands of the lea.
